imdb.plot outline: PSD is a true story based loosely on the experiences in the life of writer, director and producer- Sylvia "SylkyDiva" Wilson. Revealing the lack of social acceptance that many Plus Size Women alike face today- this is a story to be told. Brace yourself for an intense yet inspiring journey as we follow the everyday lives of nine musically talented Plus Size Divas and a little Divette, who struggles to find self-love in a world where discrimination, bullying, and size-acceptance are an endless, constant battle. Beaten down by society- the only way to overcome even the glass ceiling, is through prayer and belief in GOD. Optimistic and determined to find success, these Divas will stop at nothing to let their lights shine even through the midst of the darkest circumstances.
imdb.title: Plus Size Divas
plot: _Plus Size Divas_ (qv) The Movie and Musical will present cases that contributes to the literature by describing an intervention for these acts of abuse that has implications for practice and the related policies regarding them.::Sylvia Wilson

PSD is a true story based loosely on the experiences in the life of writer, director and producer- Sylvia "SylkyDiva" Wilson. Revealing the lack of social acceptance that many Plus Size Women alike face today- this is a story to be told. Brace yourself for an intense yet inspiring journey as we follow the everyday lives of nine musically talented _Plus Size Divas_ (qv) and a little Divette, who struggles to find self-love in a world where discrimination, bullying, and size-acceptance are an endless, constant battle. Beaten down by society- the only way to overcome even the glass ceiling, is through prayer and belief in GOD. Optimistic and determined to find success, these Divas will stop at nothing to let their lights shine even through the midst of the darkest circumstances.::Sylvia Wilson
